Elliot.line: Hey, uh... I saw the painting in your room, Ms. Niedenberg.

Liz.line: W-What? What makes you think you have the right to do that?

Elliot.line: Sorry, I... Well... I just wanted to say... it's beautiful.

Liz.line: Hmph. It's... nothing. Who are you, anyway, to know about art? Leave me alone, please.
